channel.title: SeaMeet 功能發布和修復 on
channel.description: Recent content in SeaMeet 功能發布和修復 on

item.title: SeaMeet 版本發布資訊
item.description: [feature] 01/25/2024, SeaX supports viewing scheduled campaigns 01/18/2024 # Browser support: SeaMeet Extension supports browsers including chrome, edge, arc, brave [feature] 01/25/2024, SeaMeet updated new SignIn [Bug Fixes] 01/24/2024 SeaChat addressed the problem of using simplified Chinese for traditional Chinese questions. SeaChat resolved the issue with the Webchat widget preview, ensuring that it now displays the final results accurately.
